org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.federation.policies

接口 ConfigurableFederationPolicy

  • 所有已知子接口:
    FederationAMRMProxyPolicy, FederationRouterPolicy
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractAMRMProxyPolicy, AbstractConfigurableFederationPolicy, AbstractRouterPolicy, BroadcastAMRMProxyPolicy, HashBasedRouterPolicy, LoadBasedRouterPolicy, LocalityMulticastAMRMProxyPolicy, PriorityRouterPolicy, RejectAMRMProxyPolicy, RejectRouterPolicy, UniformRandomRouterPolicy, WeightedRandomRouterPolicy

    public interface ConfigurableFederationPolicy
    This interface provides a general method to reinitialize a policy. The semantics are try-n-swap, so in case of an exception is thrown the implmentation must ensure the previous state and configuration is preserved.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void reinitialize(FederationPolicyInitializationContext policyContext)
      This method is invoked to initialize of update the configuration of policies.

    • 方法详细资料

      • reinitialize

        void reinitialize(FederationPolicyInitializationContext policyContext)
           throws FederationPolicyInitializationException
        This method is invoked to initialize of update the configuration of policies. The implementor should provide try-n-swap semantics, and retain state if possible.
        参数:
        policyContext - the new context to provide to implementor.
        抛出:
        FederationPolicyInitializationException - in case the initialization fails.
